website_summaries.verdict: Great for moisturizing, this steamer uses ozone to give your scalp a more thorough, deep clean.
pros: Produces micro-fine steam that permeates through your hair and skin layers
Moderately sized for use in salon, home, or travel
Features a PTC ceramic heating element
Ozone generates ionic water particles that penetrate hair more thoroughly
Auto shutoff stops machine when water drops below probe level
cons: Occasionally, machines fail to start upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer for natural kinky hair.
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer, works great on my natural kinky hair. I added my deep conditioner and steamed for 15 minutes. Also it didn't drip hot water while sitting under, water dripped from my hair onto my face which is expected.
customer_reviews.author: MarshaJ

customer_reviews.title: As a Hairdresser I APPROVE
customer_reviews.text: This hair and face steamer is truly remarkable! Simple to use and clean. Compact for storage. Works great for deep conditioning treatments on the hair. Had a attachment for facial steaming. Comes with helpful and easy to read instructions. I have beem using this steamer for hair treatments, thus far I have had no issues and I plan to keep using it. I am a hairdresser and I don't have time to get my hair done at the salon. This Steamer gives me professional grade services at the convenience of my own home.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Felicia

customer_reviews.title: My hair has never been healthier.
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with this. My only regret is not buying it sooner. My hair has never been so moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Moss

customer_reviews.title: Type 4/Low Porosity Saver
customer_reviews.text: Helps with my type 4 low porosity hair. I use this steamer for my wash days while deep conditioning. I definitely see a difference in softness and moisture retention. I only stay under for 15 minutes, then an additional 45 with just my cap without heat. I wouldn’t exceed 15 minutes, to avoid moisture overload and/or heat damage. If you really want to see amazing results, prepoo (with an oil), shampoo/condition, DC with the steamer and follow up with LCO method.
customer_reviews.author: RCG

customer_reviews.title: SO glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: After years of getting deep conditioning at a salon, I went ahead and bought this hair steamer for home use. I am so glad with my purchase! This is easy to use and effective. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dani T

customer_reviews.title: Defective.  Never worked
customer_reviews.text: Steamer never worked! Red lights continually blinking. Did not heat water. Tried it in every electrical outlet in the house. So frustrating to order something and have it not work and to go to the trouble of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Qatro

customer_reviews.title: No good No bueno
customer_reviews.text: For the hair portion of the steamer it made my hair more dry and scalp very itchy now you all know that part could just be me lol. I also used it once for the face which it felt amazing but never worked again. The company rapidly refunded my money and even offered to send another set out. Would I recommend hmmm I don’t know I mean if you could get a working one it’s a great product. Hope this is helpful..
customer_reviews.author: LaMeka Y. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORRY IT
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! It broke 2 weeks later! DO NOT PURCHASE! It leaks hot water with no drip cup. It's not worth the money. You might as well order a professional steamer! The head is to heavy for the base
customer_reviews.author: MsHairIsMyPassion

customer_reviews.title: Overall really great product!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a great product for the value. The hair steamer down is a little weird in that it won’t actually steam the very back of your head. You will have to adjust your positioning periodically. But the facial steam is great when paired with a clay mask!
customer_reviews.author: Rahel

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: I WAS REALLY LOOKING FOWARD TO USING THE STEAMER BUT IT NEVER WORKED. I TRIED IT ON THE FIRST DAY, THE STEAMER RED LIGHT WAS ON, 2 MINUTES LATER IT WENT OFF AND SINCE THEN THE STEAMER DOES NOT WORK/ BROKEN. I DIDN'T EVEN GET TO USE IT. IT IS REALLY BAD WHEN YOU GET TO SPEND ALL THAT MONEY ON A STEAMER AND IT DOESNT WORK EVEN FOR A DAY (I WISH IT DID LAST FOR A WEEK). IT IS HARD FOR ME TO REFUND IT AS I'M IN AN AMERICAN ARMY BASE WHICH MAKES IT WORSE. VERY DISAPPOINTED. WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have❗️
customer_reviews.text: I love 💗 this face/hair steamer , it was easy to assemble, I made sure I used this several times before I decided to make a review, my skin has never looked or felt better , instant moisture & softness, I also used the steamer for my hair with a deep conditioner and the process was great the steamer definitely helped the deep conditioner penetrate into my strands and giving me max hydration on my hair , I would definitely recommend this to anyone giving their hair extra love 💕
customer_reviews.author: Sherri C.

customer_reviews.title: Only steamed for 10 minutes and quit.
customer_reviews.text: It worked correctly for about 10 minutes and stopped steaming. I tried to make it work by following all directions but it would not steam anymore. I sent it back. I will not buy another steamer. I bought a heat cap for my hair instead and it works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you’re into beauty and hair this is the one
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much i was using the head steamer and thought maybe I can lean back and get a little steam on my face too a little duo action and when I did that it burnt the back of my head And I literally felt like Michael jackson when he fell down the steps on the Pepsi commercial with his hair on fire. Good thing It didn’t burn my hair off. Just be careful and read where they caution you for excessive heat.
customer_reviews.author: Mcmeans

customer_reviews.title: Works great but there is a challenge
customer_reviews.text: I really like the steamer it works great so far. The one thing I don’t like is the base doesn’t seem to be heavy enough. Even when sitting on a level surface it has a tendency to tip so you have to make sure your careful when using it. And finding a level surface and a chair that is the right height has been a challenge. But I still like the way the steamer works on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it leaks on to shoulders
customer_reviews.text: This product has a small head, so it doesn't cover entire hair/head so it doesn't steam entire head of hair but just the top.
customer_reviews.author: It's AllGood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent facial steamer mediocre hood
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the hood of the dryer because it is not adjustable but I love the facial steaming component.
customer_reviews.author: Bigfoot

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment & Waste of Money!
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed bought item at the end of April received it the beginning of May and I’ve been using it once every 2 weeks and it’s the beginning of July and it no longer works! What a Complete Waste of money and received this item with no customer service # or website...unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Crack city

customer_reviews.title: Hair steamer is no good.  Works well as face steamer.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is extremely cheap. I was scared to use it. The face steamer works wonderfully, only problem is that it spits out boiling hot water sometimes. The hair steamer only steams on one side. It doesn't come out in the front at all. I had to move the steamer to get the other parts of my head. Going to have to put a towel around it to steam everywhere at once. Hope that works
customer_reviews.author: Detaun

customer_reviews.title: Revised Review
customer_reviews.text: Adjusting my review, I received all parts of the steamer. I've used it five times so far. I really love it. I haven't used the face steamer piece yet. It takes 7 minutes to really get going (as stated in the instructions). I have to place items under the steamer to get it at the right height we. Please be careful! Sometimes the water ends up running along my neck and it can be hot! Altogether no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: nini89

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS (unable to use)
customer_reviews.text: Well- I carved out time to steam my hair and deep condition before I put a long term protective style in, and as I sit here with conditioner in my hair, my freshly opened box is missing some major components that would allow me to connect the headpiece and do a facial. I saw I’m not the only one with this issue. Get it together, guys. Hopefully someone will rectify this ASAP, but I won’t be able to do what I wanted to, so it was basically a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this product works great but I wouldn’t know because I didn’t receive all the parts to assemble the hood onto the base.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Tested hair steamer only and it steams well. One area of concern rests with the fact that the back part of the head does not get as much steam. So you have to sit more erect or even better, carefully turn yr head around to face the back of the machine. I needed a portable machine and this will do
customer_reviews.author: jjbritt

customer_reviews.title: 1 heat setting.
customer_reviews.text: Steam is very hot. I wish that it had 2 heat settings because it's very uncomfortable to sit for more than 10m.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life!
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry hair and since using the steamer I can go over a week without re-moisturizing; I normally needed to re-moisturize every 1-2 days. The only con is occasionally when the steam solidifies and burns you.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Facial steam
customer_reviews.text: It came rather quickly and I was loving the face steaming for aslong as it lasted but it stop working so I’m disappointed about that so it’s a great product when it’s working but to bad it doesn’t work very long
customer_reviews.author: Talika Mccrae

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I received my hydration on last week and used it this past Saturday 04/11 and I love it.After reading the reviews I am glad I purchased this.It hydrated my scalp just like I was at the salon.My hair was very soft after using this along with my hair mask.I also tried the face steamer but still trying to find a comfortable position with it .I feel the steam coming out so I’m sure I’m going to love it as well.The water heats up within 5-7 minutes just as stated and I had no drips.After paying 20 dollars once a month at the salon for hydration I can do it myself at home.Happy customer:)
customer_reviews.author: jacklyn whitley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Steamer!
customer_reviews.text: During this COVID-19 pandemic, I have missed my bi- weekly steam treatments at my hair salon. This steamer has been a welcomed piece of equipment as I maintain 4c hair. Really works well. Only con is I wish the height could be adjusted more....unless I'm doing something wrong. Otherwise, works GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Burned my shoulder! It leaked and spit out hot water. BE CAREFUL WITH THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: S L Mack Gray

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective. Water never heated up
customer_reviews.text: Steamer never worked! Red lights continually blinking. Did not heat water. Tried it in every electrical outlet in the house. So frustrating to order something and have it not work and to go to the trouble of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my unit lasted one week
customer_reviews.text: this is a good steam IF you get a unit that works. the unit delivered to me worked for about a week or so then I got the dreaded continuous long beep. It never turned on again after that. returned it and went with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Geb

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I did not upload a picture, but this steamer is awesome. AT first it takes a bit to heat up, but it works really well. Just remember to vent it or you will have too much heat under the helmet. Leaves hair feeling very soft and brings back elasticity. I am not sure what the other button is for. Only used it once, but didn't know what it did. One thing I don't like is how much condensation comes out from the hood, but that is neither here nor there. Not a deal breaker. Steams hair very well. I didn't get to try the face steamer attachment, but that is next. Perhaps I will write another review after that.
customer_reviews.author: Tillabean

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect! Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Used it today for the first time! Love it!!!! Am on a journey to start getting my Curls back to life. This was recommended by a friend and am so happy I got it to help with my moisturizing treatments :)
customer_reviews.author: Berenisse Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Worked only for 7 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly and as expected for 6 months. Purchased in February 2020. Only used it once per month with my at home protein treatment and one random day in month 7, September 2020 it just wouldn’t turn on. Stopped working just like that!! I think it’s a cheap knock off and you get what you pay for. Save your money towards a higher end quality model. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS STEAMER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My must have 4c necessity
customer_reviews.text: I recommend getting a steamer for anyone who suffers from dry damage hair. This particular steamer is easy to use, and heats quickly. My only con is that since the neck isn’t adjustable like a hair dryer, I have to maneuver myself so my hair gets the maximum steam. Overall, it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer!
customer_reviews.text: this steamer is great because it’s big and covers the whole head. I’ve used another desk steamer similar to this, but I would have to turn around half the time in order to steam the back of my head. I really didn’t want a desk steamer, I wanted a floor steamer, but I’m happy with my purchase! Works well, the one thing I don’t like is it starts to tip toward the end of the steam cycle because the water creates balance, but it other than that, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not a good product
customer_reviews.text: This product worked only one time for a but 30 minutes, and it started dripping and then shut off never to start again. I had bought this for steaming my hair. Very bad product at all money lost on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cleo

customer_reviews.title: Real deal
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was confusing. But overall it’s a good steamer. The steamer gets really hot, your forehead will be dripping after a few minutes. Make sure you have a towel. I wish it had some type of temperature control.
customer_reviews.author: Taliyah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful hair steamer
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using a Hair steamer. I did a lot of research before purchasing this hair steamer and I have no regrets. It works properly. One issue was the sender forgot to send all the parts to this steamer when I contacted them they were on top of it and responded in a matter of time. They were nice about it. Parts came in quicker than expected. Overall I will update this review once I have more uses from this steamer. So far so great
customer_reviews.author: Johnson Chatelain

customer_reviews.title: Hood works great
customer_reviews.text: I used the hood steamer 3 times already with deep conditioner & plastic bag on my head. Hair felt so soft & hydrated. My hair maintains moisture longer. Hood gives off great steam.
customer_reviews.author: twisted pride

customer_reviews.title: This product gives you a Big Bang for your Bucks
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It has met all of my expectations. My hair is so supple and I love how it looks and feels. I will be purchasing this item for my daughter and granddaughter for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing & easy to use. Works on dreads and natural hair. Greatest investment ever and less than going to the salon
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: good steamer a few flaws
customer_reviews.text: good steamer it"ll steams for 35 min, but it does hold water inside the brim. not sure why it dosent steam off or drain back. so make sure you have a towel around your shoulders
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. I do a facial steam three times a week. It’s very easy to use. Downside I wish it was another way to discard excess water. However I just let it air dry. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Babyshowerqueen

customer_reviews.title: Use Distilled or Purfied  water
customer_reviews.text: Definitely easy to set up! The steam is powerful. Works well. Honestly no complaints. I purchase a bottle of distilled water to prolong the life of this machine. I can’t wait to reap the benefits!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Williams

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this steamer. It has been a lifesaver for my hair during Corona. I kept hesitating before the quarantine. I am so glad I went ahead and got it. My hairdresser is pleased with my upkeep.
customer_reviews.author: believer523

customer_reviews.title: Too hot
customer_reviews.text: It worked at first for about 4 uses now it gets too hot it’s unbearable now I can’t do anything about it
customer_reviews.author: Dances with Glitter

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! MISSING COMPONENTS
customer_reviews.text: the original order i placed did not come with the nozzle/ silicone pipe so i ordered a replacement believing it was a mishap....the replacement order also had missing nozzle and silicone pipe so neither are even usable in any capacity. don't waste your money. buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! it works wonders, I had started to break out and with my face wash, they are perfect together.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Steams to perfection
customer_reviews.text: I needed a hair steamer bad!!! This was perfect. Does the trick!!! Remeber to use purified water and your set !!!
customer_reviews.author: Loveion

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: My hair has been looking fabulous lately. Definitely would recommend to all my friends. And the fact that it doubles as a facial steamer is epic. In love with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Odom

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good and works very well, only issue is the water inlet lid arrived with crack on its tube... will appreciate if you could send us a replacement only for the lid. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Anas

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality a powerful Steamer! Stays on for a long time, Steams really well. Easy to take down and put together. I use it as facial steamer and hair steamer
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Bragg

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIND
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS STEAMER. Heats up nicely. Had a great result so far. It’s just large so storage sucks. But worth it!
customer_reviews.author: gabriella Kazevra

customer_reviews.title: The absolute BEST
customer_reviews.text: There is no better feeling I absolutely love this set. The best moisturizer I have used by far. My 4C hair with conditioner under the steamer is everything. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Mold
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd use and it has mold. I have not been been able to figure out how to access the water container to properly clean it. I will not use again if I cant not clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Nyeasha Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Lock moisture in for juicy curls
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this steamer for my hair and my daughter's hair over the last couple of months. Absolutely LOVE it. I feel a noticeable difference in my hair and my curl retention. I would highly recommend this product and would be more than happy to purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McCall

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every week for conditioning treatments! It works well!
customer_reviews.author: Dress4Him

customer_reviews.title: Great hair steamer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hair steamer & it allows me to moisturize my hair. I haven't used the facial steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use and it really gets the job done, it has been a game changer for my natural hair routine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but the hood doesn’t raise or lower to adjust height .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good results
customer_reviews.text: It did not adjust in height. I used the product to steam my hair. However, it was an easy clean up. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: 😊 Enjoy
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the way this system makes my head feel after a shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: Great product for in home use
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product to use at home. I steamed both my daughter hair and I used it to steam my face. This product was a great price and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: CHANEL CLARK

customer_reviews.title: Over time I might appreciate it more
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st time ever using a steamer. Maybe I will appreciate it after a while. So, it sends to do what it was intended to do. I've used it twice so far. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loveee
customer_reviews.text: Loveeeee this steamer my hair hasn’t felt this good before I started using it!! Haven’t used the facial part yet
customer_reviews.author: Miracle

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Definitely moisturizes the hair especially if you are deep conditioning. The attachment for the face driver spa quality steam for facials
customer_reviews.author: MS. BG

customer_reviews.title: Great Steam Heat it gives
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s my first time using it and I am loving how easy to setup and use. The steam is so strong and good!
customer_reviews.author: Rickila Hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: I Love It.
customer_reviews.text: Great Price. Quality Hair Steamer. I Love it. No complaints. Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to moisturize my natural hair. I also open the pores in my face.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great Steamer
customer_reviews.text: This steamer helps to restore moisture to my hair and the amount of steam provided is great
customer_reviews.author: vivacious01

customer_reviews.title: Valuable
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! You should have one because it work wonders and circulate hair follicles for hair growth. GREAT for a gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: Smiths

customer_reviews.title: It dreams very well
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is amazing! I bought another brand from amazon and hated it but this one is my replacement and it works perfect! No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: cece

customer_reviews.title: Convince
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with my purchase, do handy to have around and not have to go to a salon right now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll LOVE this.... good buy
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely works. My 4c hair fell in love with it. Gonna use the facial next
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatility
customer_reviews.text: Great for face steaming and hair steaming. Curls look great after using. A great find for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Facial attachment?
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my steamer but I need to know if I can reorder the facial attachment because my dogs chewed it up...😅
customer_reviews.author: Robby Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Easy. to Use
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoying my steam., and great for keeping your hair moist
customer_reviews.author: Marsol

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer, very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer! I used it as soon as I got it. It is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment for Natural Hair Steaming
customer_reviews.text: I use this to steam my hair. It was completely easy to assemble and use. It took my curls to a new level. I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: JaQwaysia Edge

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great steam production, easy to assemble, very light, great for traveling stylist or home use
customer_reviews.author: A Ware

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this steamer. I’ve had it about 2 months with great results.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. TMAC

customer_reviews.title: That it steam my whole head
customer_reviews.text: Steam do not come to the front of the dryer
customer_reviews.author: trina f.

customer_reviews.title: We liked it .
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use and did met our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: fentale saro

customer_reviews.title: Best for Natural Tresses
customer_reviews.text: Best steamer...gets my hair super soft...no matter what conditioner I use
customer_reviews.author: samantha p.

customer_reviews.title: Defective.  Really wanted to like it
customer_reviews.text: Tried several times to get this thing to work. The lights just kept flashing no matter what I pushed. Only got it to work once and even then it didn't seem to get my hair that moisturized. I had better luck with my old QRedew which broke unfortunately. I ended up returning this steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Missy2beTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY Disappointed then Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using it out of the box and the water does not boil enough to produce steam. Everything was connected properly, we even tried several different outlets.. no boil..no steam..nothing. Highly disgusted! To add injury to insult I am three days outside of my grace period for returns. August 15, 2019 update. I was sent a new steamer after this update and it works phenomenally! The only reason I give it four stars is because I was called multiple times a day daily until I fixed the review- which makes perfect sense IF I had used the new steamer when they sent it.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase/different maker
customer_reviews.text: I had a steamer that I was in love with! I lost the small cap that you release the water from so it dripped and didn't work properly. It was at a less price and was excellent so needless to say I did not want to purchase another one for such a small reason! After my hair began to dry I decided to research for another one. Although this one doesn't mount up to my first purchase on Amazon, it is a great product and I would definitely recommend. I like that on this one you are allowed multiple time settings depending on the water line you use to fill. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbykat

customer_reviews.title: I should have taken heed to the other reviews! Stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: This product was great the first and second time I used it. Went to use it a third time and it no longer emits any steam, the base just slightly boils and that’s it. I’ve followed the directions to the tee...I’m sooooooo upset this happened, I tried to give it the benefit of the doubt but I should have just read the reviews and NOT buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karmin B.

customer_reviews.title: Was Looking Forward to Ozone Setting..Doesn’t Work!
customer_reviews.text: Received early May due to pandemic shipping delays. Finally used steamer for first time today and unfortunately the UV lamp doesn’t work. Ozone button is on but no color coming from lightbulb compared to video in other review. Unfortunately, outside return period. Wish I could be sent a replacement for main unit.
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyah

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this merchandise it worked wonderful, and for no apparent reason it has completely STOPED.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Beeps way too much
customer_reviews.text: I did not have this long at all it beeps way too much and only stopped when I added a lil salt to the water (rediculous) so I bought a different brand instead and I love this one more
customer_reviews.author: M. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME AND A GOOD BUY
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. This is my second time ordering, the first one from a different seller was missing parts so I had to return it. I was a little apprehensive ordering this one but I took a chance. I am glad I did :) I just wish the actual steamer for the face is a little bit more mobile.
customer_reviews.author: CHENG

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this and the fact that it is easy to use and to clean and store. It’s quick to put together as well and it is great for my hair! My hair is soft and well moisturized. My curls really pop now!!
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far, i used the facial steamer first. it was easy to assemble and I used it right away. I added lavender essential oil to it and it was so relaxing I almost fell asleep. I will give a review once I use the hair steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Nisey

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: So Far I’m Satisfied, I Would Rather Do This At Home Then Paying Someone .. Wasting All That Money When You Can Do It Yourself
customer_reviews.author: De'Shanta

customer_reviews.title: Good steam flow
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I use it more often to steam my face. The reservoir is substantial for a good steam. It has helped my skin tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: FancyFlower

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is way more powerful than the humidifier I have. It actually boils water and generates a huge amount of steam, which scared me a bit the first time. It works better than I expected, and relieves my tensions from study too.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Study and Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize that my previous steamer of three years was low quality until I replaced it with this steamer. This steamer is well made and does the job of providing a thorough moisturizing treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my steamer that died on me after having it for 8 years or so. It is better designed than my original, and i'm happy with it as the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: 2 in 1
customer_reviews.text: I dont know if im using the product well but i dont think it actually do anything. But i still like it
customer_reviews.author: JASweetheart

product_meta.title: Hair Steamer Kingsteam 2 in 1 Ozone Facial Steamer, Design for Personal Care Use At Home or Salon
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackMoney-and-Time Saver:
The face and hair steamer offers you an amazing salon-like home hair treatment and face care with easy quick and safe operation, save time and money.

Instructions: 
Hair steaming method: 
1.Wash your hair and dry it until half dry, don't use the steam cap so the steam can penetrate your scalp and bring moisture straight to the roots and hair shaft
2.Place the machine on a desktop, fill in water then connect power to it
3.Press power button then switch steam button, steam will come out in 5-6mins, then you can start using
4.Steam time 10-15 minutes 
Facial steaming method: 
1. Wash your face with a facial cleanser before steaming 
2. Fill the water into steamer and start the device
3.Adjust the angle of sprayer according to your needs with 360° rotatable sprayer 
4. To avoid burning your face, keep your face 8 to 12 inches away from the steamer, steam time 10-15mins
5. Aromatherapy diffusing function is provided

Notes: 
1. Please read instructions before initial operation and keep it for further reference
2. When the steamer is used for the first time, some water may remain in the water tank. This is residual water used for inspection in the factory and We guarantee the product you receive is a whole new one
3. Purified/distilled water is recommended to use
4. Turn off the steamer after use, and pour out the water only after the water has become cool


Specifications: 
Product Name: Hair Steamer Kingsteam 2 in 1 Ozone Facial Steamer, Design for Personal Care Use At Home or Salon, Black
Model Number: JY-15CL
Rated Voltage: AC110-120V
Rated Frequency: 60Hz
Power: 330W
Product Size: hair steamer:13*12*20inches, Facial stemer:11*9*7inches 

Product Composition:
1*TUV&CE approved Steamer
1*Hair Care Cap
1*Bracket Connector
1 *Facial sprayer tube
1*User Manual
feature_bullets: Hair steamer for natural hair: provide valuable nutrient to unhealthy hair, prevents breakage and split ends, treating brittle&damaged hair; Facial steamer: Opens and unclogs your pores, allows you to remove dirt, oil and grime from your skin; Melts away dead skin cells, replace chemical exfoliating scrubs & peels; Make toner, cream and other nutrients absorbable. Aromatherapy diffusing function is provided.

The difference between Kingsteam 2 in 1 facial steamer and market is that we takes the advanced PTC ceramic heating element to vaporize clean water and produce a visibly strong steam instantly. Ample and directed micro-fine steams penetrate deeply into all your hair and skin layers. Plus ozone generated Ion water particles can be up to 10x more effective in penetrating hair and skin.
Auto-off function:Hair and Facial steamer will turn off automatically when water is lower than probe and alarm until you press OFF button to unplug the device.
Conveniently sized: This is professional-quality machine of hair steamer for black hair also delivers convenient portability, ideally suited for use at the salon, at home, or while traveling.

Safety and Guarantee :TUV&CE approved 2 in 1 hair steamer, your safety is always our priority, If for whatever reason you don’t love our kingsteam, let us know within 30 days, and we can give you a full refund or send you a replacement, just buy with confidence.
